description.zh-cn: 位于太平洋西南部的主权岛国，是英联邦王国之一。
description.en: A sovereign island country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean, one of the Commonwealth realms.

description.zh-cn: 现任新西兰君主，由英国君主兼任。
description.en: The current Monarch of New Zealand, a role held by the monarch of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 现任新西兰总督，是新西兰君主在国内的代表。
description.en: The current Governor-General of New Zealand, representative of the Monarch of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 现任新西兰总理，新西兰国家党党魁。
description.en: The current Prime Minister of New Zealand and leader of the New Zealand National Party.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰的主要政党之一，现任总理克里斯托弗·卢克森为其成员。
description.en: One of the major political parties in New Zealand, of which the current Prime Minister Christopher Luxon is a member.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，历史上曾将新西兰作为其殖民地。
description.en: A European country that historically colonized New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 由部分毛利部落组成的邦联，是《怀唐伊条约》的签署方之一。
description.en: A confederation of Māori tribes, one of the signatories of the Treaty of Waitangi.

description.zh-cn: 英国与毛利人签订的条约，该条约的签订标志着新西兰成为英国殖民地。
description.en: A treaty signed between the British Crown and Māori chiefs, which established New Zealand as a British colony.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪英国殖民者与毛利人之间因土地问题爆发的一系列武装冲突。
description.en: A series of armed conflicts in the 19th century between British colonists and Māori over land issues.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰的原住民，属于波利尼西亚人的一支。
description.en: The indigenous Polynesian people of mainland New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰在1841年至1907年间的政治实体，为大英帝国的一部分。
description.en: The political entity of New Zealand from 1841 to 1907, as part of the British Empire.

description.zh-cn: 英国在澳大利亚的第一个殖民地，新西兰曾一度被划入其管辖范围。
description.en: The first British colony in Australia, which once had jurisdiction over New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 2019年基督城清真寺枪击案的袭击者。
description.en: The perpetrator of the 2019 Christchurch mosque shootings.

description.zh-cn: 2019年3月15日在新西兰基督城发生的大规模枪击事件。
description.en: A mass shooting that occurred in Christchurch, New Zealand, on March 15, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 包括新西兰、库克群岛、纽埃、托克劳和罗斯属地在内的政治实体集合。
description.en: The entire area in which the monarch of New Zealand functions as head of state, comprising New Zealand, the Cook Islands, Niue, Tokelau, and the Ross Dependency.

description.zh-cn: 与新西兰处于自由联合关系的南太平洋国家。
description.en: A self-governing island country in the South Pacific Ocean in free association with New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 与新西兰处于自由联合关系的南太平洋岛国。
description.en: An island country in the South Pacific Ocean in free association with New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 由新西兰管辖的南太平洋属地。
description.en: A dependent territory of New Zealand in the southern Pacific Ocean.

description.zh-cn: 大洋洲国家，与新西兰在政治、经济、军事上有密切合作关系。
description.en: A country in Oceania that has close political, economic, and military cooperation with New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 由澳大利亚和新西兰联合举办的国际女子足球赛事。
description.en: An international women's football tournament co-hosted by Australia and New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰探险家，首位有记载抵达新西兰的欧洲人。
description.en: A Dutch explorer, the first known European to reach New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪的荷兰特许公司，派遣亚伯·塔斯曼进行探险。
description.en: A Dutch chartered company from the 17th century that sponsored Abel Tasman's voyages of exploration.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰的一个省份，新西兰（Nieuw Zeeland）因此得名。
description.en: A province of the Netherlands after which New Zealand (Nieuw Zeeland) was named.

description.zh-cn: 英国探险家，对新西兰进行了详细的勘察和地图绘制。
description.en: A British explorer who conducted detailed surveys and mapping of New Zealand.

nodes.id: 1947年威斯敏斯特法令采纳法令

zh-cn: 1947年威斯敏斯特法令采纳法令

description.zh-cn: 新西兰国会通过的法令，使其获得了完全的立法独立性。
description.en: An act passed by the New Zealand Parliament that granted it full legislative independence.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰前总理，是该国第一位民选产生的女性总理。
description.en: A former Prime Minister of New Zealand, and the country's first elected female prime minister.

description.zh-cn: 查尔斯三世是新西兰的国家元首。
description.en: Charles III is the head of state of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 辛迪·基罗作为总督，是君主在新西兰的代表。
description.en: As Governor-General, Cindy Kiro is the monarch's representative in New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰总督是新西兰君主的代表。
description.en: The Governor-General of New Zealand is the representative of the Monarch of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 克里斯托弗·卢克森是现任新西兰总理。
description.en: Christopher Luxon is the current Prime Minister of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 克里斯托弗·卢克森是新西兰国家党的成员和现任党魁。
description.en: Christopher Luxon is a member and the current leader of the New Zealand National Party.

description.zh-cn: 亚伯·塔斯曼是奉荷兰东印度公司之命进行探险的。
description.en: Abel Tasman was commissioned by the Dutch East India Company to undertake his voyage of exploration.

description.zh-cn: 1642年，亚伯·塔斯曼率领的船队抵达新西兰，成为首批有记载到此的欧洲人。
description.en: In 1642, the fleet led by Abel Tasman reached New Zealand, becoming the first recorded Europeans to do so.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰绘图师以荷兰的泽兰省（Zeeland）将该地命名为“Nieuw Zeeland”。
description.en: Dutch cartographers named the area 'Nieuw Zeeland' after the Dutch province of Zeeland.

description.zh-cn: 自1769年起，詹姆斯·库克船长到访新西兰，并为其绘制了地图。
description.en: Starting in 1769, Captain James Cook visited New Zealand and charted its coastline.

description.zh-cn: 英国是《怀唐伊条约》的发起和签署方之一。
description.en: The United Kingdom was one of the initiators and signatories of the Treaty of Waitangi.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰联合部落是《怀唐伊条约》的签署方之一。
description.en: The United Tribes of New Zealand was one of the signatories of the Treaty of Waitangi.

description.zh-cn: 《怀唐伊条约》的签订使新西兰成为英国的殖民地。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Waitangi established New Zealand as a British colony.

description.zh-cn: 1788年，英国将新西兰划入新南威尔斯殖民地管辖，直到1841年7月分离。
description.en: In 1788, the United Kingdom placed New Zealand under the jurisdiction of the Colony of New South Wales, until its separation in July 1841.

description.zh-cn: 在1845年至1872年的新西兰土地战争期间，殖民地政府与毛利人部落处于敌对状态。
description.en: During the New Zealand Wars from 1845 to 1872, the colonial government was in a state of conflict with Māori tribes.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰土地战争导致毛利人大量伤亡和约1.6万平方公里土地被没收。
description.en: The New Zealand Wars resulted in significant Māori casualties and the confiscation of about 16,000 square kilometers of their land.

relationships.source: 1947年威斯敏斯特法令采纳法令

description.zh-cn: 1947年该法令的通过使新西兰从英国独立，拥有了完全的自主权。
description.en: The adoption of this act in 1947 granted New Zealand full autonomy and independence from the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，海伦·克拉克成为新西兰第一位民选女性总理。
description.en: In 1999, Helen Clark became New Zealand's first elected female Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 布伦顿·塔兰特是基督城清真寺枪击案的袭击者。
description.en: Brenton Tarrant was the attacker in the Christchurch mosque shootings.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰是新西兰王国的主体部分。
description.en: New Zealand is the principal part of the Realm of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 库克群岛是新西兰的联系邦，处于自由联合关系中。
description.en: The Cook Islands is an associated state of New Zealand, in a relationship of free association.

description.zh-cn: 纽埃是新西兰的联系邦，处于自由联合关系中。
description.en: Niue is an associated state of New Zealand, in a relationship of free association.

description.zh-cn: 托克劳是由新西兰管辖的属地。
description.en: Tokelau is a territory administered by New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰与澳大利亚在政治、经济与军事上有密切的合作关系。
description.en: New Zealand has close political, economic, and military cooperation with Australia.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰与澳大利亚联合举办了2023年国际足联女子世界杯。
description.en: New Zealand co-hosted the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup with Australia.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚与新西兰联合举办了2023年国际足联女子世界杯。
description.en: Australia co-hosted the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup with New Zealand.
